testCase.name: AppComponent should create the app
AppComponent should have as title 'book-list'
Service: Book should ...
BookDetailComponent should have an img element with alt= bookDetails.name
BookDetailComponent should have 3 <dd> elements
BookDetailComponent should have an img element with src= bookDetails.image
BookDetailComponent should have one dd tag for component.bookDetail.editorial.name
BookDetailComponent should have one dd tag for component.bookDetail.publishingDate
BookDetailComponent should create
BookDetailComponent should have a p.h3.p-3 element with bookDetails.name
BookDetailComponent should have one dd tag for component.bookDetail.isbn
BookListComponent should have the corresponding src to the book image and alt to the book name
BookListComponent should have h5 tag with the book.name
BookListComponent should have 10 elements
BookListComponent should have 10 <div.card-body> elements
BookListComponent should have p tag with the book.editorial.name
BookListComponent should have 9 <div.col.mb-2> elements and the deleted book should not exist

BookListComponent should have 10 <card.p-2> elements
